title: Currently downloading a 4GB patch, after having just played League yesterday.
body: Is today's patch supposed to be this massive? I didn't expect it to be half the size of League itself. I'm irritated because my friends wanted to play League with me today, but, after literally playing with them yesterday, I have to download a patch 20 times the size of theirs. I've done nothing to League's files, and I have no custom skins/soundpacks or anything installed. I am super irritated. Can anyone help me out, or should I just let the patch download?

replies.body:
If you were already at 7.14 then that 4gb is just a [visual display issue](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion-en/AdF7xEup-patch-715-size?comment=0000).  While it's a content patch, it is not nearly that large.

If your patcher is failing to grab updates then your network could be having issues reaching the server or backtracking.  I know you're irritated, but the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help get this fixed up.  Hope it offers some relief!
